job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtwere a cognitive science company on a mission to optimize the measurement of brain health to advance the development of new medicines and to enable earlier clinical insights in equivalent experienceltligtltligtknowledge of javascript typescript angular html and cssltligtltligtknowledge of c entity framework rest services with webapiltligtltligtknowledge of relational and nosql databases such as sql server and mongodbltligtltligtexperience with version control systems tfs gitltligtltligtstrong experience with web standards browser capabilities workarounds bestpractice thinking and comfort evaluating and deploying new technologiesltligtltligtsolid ability to work effectively under pressure and meet tight deadlinesltligtltligtability to adapt and learn new technologiesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtcompany perksltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtremote work practices cogstate is a virtual first company cogstate employees can work from anywhere where cogstate is registered to do business within the united states australia or the united kingdomltligtltligtgenerous paid timeoff cogstate employees receive days of vacation leave days of personal leave and paid public holidays which can be tailored to dates of personal cultural or religious significance to youltligtltligtk matching as you invest in yourself and your future cogstate invests in you too we match up to of your yearly salary in cogstates k programltligtltligtcompetitive salary we offer competitive base salaries plus additional earning opportunities based on the positionltligtltligthealth dental ampamp vision coverage weve invested in comprehensive health ampamp dental insurance options with competitive company contributions to help when you need it most we also offer free vision insurance for all fulltime employeesltligtltligtshortterm ampamp longterm disability life insurance employer sponsoredltligtltligtpretax benefits healthcare and dependent care flexible spending accountsltligtltligtlearning ampamp development opportunitiesampnbspcogstate offers a robust learning program from mentorships to scholarships to coursera to improve knowledge or obtain certifications in applicable areas of interestltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwhy we do what we doltstronggtltpgtltpgtour mission at cogstate is to optimize the measurement of brain health to advance the development of new medicines and to enable earlier clinical insights in healthcare we are driven by the notion that through our work we impact the health of communities by delivering solutions that combine breakthrough science with advanced technologies we are inspired by the dedication of researchers and the resilience of patients and we are strengthened by our year heritage supporting them we are always working to simplify the complex with solutions that offer insights and hope for the future of healthcare particularly dementiarelated diseases and rare and pediatric disordersltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtour core valuesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtdo the right thing we are honest and dependable we keep our promises act with integrity and foster trust through fairness transparency and open communicationltligtltligtthink like a customer we see our customers challenges as our own and strive to help them succeed we listen learn what makes them tick and adapt to creatively meet their needsltligtltligttake care of each other we work together to tackle big challenges that can only be achieved through the collective and caring efforts of diverse individuals we show appreciation value differences and celebrate winsltligtltligtlead with science we are determined curious thinkers who use knowledge and data to challenge the status quo and redefine what is possible we are experts in our fields who are trusted by our customersltligtltligtown it we are accountable to excellence and hold ourselves to high standards we are problem solvers at heart and quick to both identify obstacles and bring solutionsltligtltligtwork hard we show resilience in the face of hardship to do the messy work of innovating we stick to difficult tasks with grit and determination we iterate experiment and embrace failing forwardltligtltligtsee the big picture we are driven by an understanding that the work we do matters our personal connections to the mission may be different but we know our why and it motivates us to do our best workltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtcommitment to diversity ampamp inclusion ltstronggtltpgtltpgtcogstate is committed to building and maintaining a fair diverse and inclusive workplace where the personal worth of each employee is recognized and all are respected and valued for their differences applicants with disabilities may be entitled to reasonable accommodation under the terms of the americans with disabilities act and certain state or local laws if you need assistance in applying please email peopleandculturecogstatecomltpgt
